# Touch X
<!--
@name: Touch X
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>

Returns the horizontal position of a touch on the screen.
## Parameters

- **index**: Number of the touchdown whose horizontal position is to be recovered.
---
